string.value: Since adolescent #t1902015# is now going through puberty, you decide to visit #b#p2060000##k in #b#m230010201##k and ask for some good advice.

#p2060000# tells you, when raising an adolescent wolf, it is an absolute must that the wolf be well-fed. She suggests that you make special formula specifically designed for adolescent wolves. #p2060000# volunteers to make some for you. Just gather the ingredients for her.

#i4000182# #t4000182# #b#c4000182# / 200#k
#i4000183# #t4000183# #b#c4000183# / 200#k
#i4000184# #t4000184# #b#c4000184# / 200#k
#i4032333# #t4032333# #b#c4032333# / 1#k
You brought the ingredients to #p2060000# and she worked her magic to create some special formula for adolescent wolves.

Hey, aren't you the one that made the #t4032332# the other day? How's the wolf pup growing? Hopefully that formula worked on the little pup… Anyway, what brought you here this time?\n#b#L0#(You show him Ryko and then the two of you discuss Ryko's health.)#l\n#k

Ahh, so the name is #t1902015#? So, #t1902015# is already on the verge of puberty. This time, I'll have to prepare a #bformula for adolescent wolves#k. In puberty, wolves require even more nutrients to keep them healthy.

Just get me the ingredients and I'll make the formula! It requires #b200 #t4000182#s#k with some lime powder, #b200 #t4000183#s#k with some ink, #b200 #t4000184#s#k, and a #b#t4032333##k that #p2060005# sells. Kind of a lot to gather up, eh?

I once raised a husky that I didn't really take very good care of while it was going through its adolescent stages. And it went crazy, destroying my sled while eating everything in sight. Very tough to handle… I bet you your wolf will act like that, too, if you don't take proper care of it. Please reconsider.
Wow, you managed to bring all the ingredients? Please wait for a bit. I'll make the formula for you right now!
Here's the formula for adolescent wolves! Give it to #t1902015# right now.
Ohh, based on how satisfied #t1902015# looked, it must taste pretty good. Please continue taking care of this adorable wolf pup.

I don't think you have gathered all the ingredients for the formula. I need #b200 #t4000182#s#k, #b200 #t4000183#s#k, #b200 #t4000184#s#k, and #b1 #t4032333##k. The first three can be found on #runderwater monsters#k and you can obtain the vitamins from #b#p2060005##k.
